protocol.name: P-GSE51692-1
protocol.text: The results were quantified and analyzed by use of Genespring ver10. ID_REF =  VALUE = GeneSpring normalized signal (Entities where at least 100 percent of samples in any 1 out of 6 conditions have values within cut-off)

protocol.name: P-GSE51692-2
protocol.text: 10-day old seedlings were transferred to ES (+Fe) and ES without addition of FeEDTA (–Fe) medium and grown for 3 days, respectively. Tissues were harvested and immediately frozen in liquid nitrogen transfer.

protocol.name: P-GSE51692-3
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted with Qiagen RNeasy mini kit

protocol.name: P-GSE51692-4
protocol.text: Ten microgram of total RNA was used for cDNA synthesis, labeled by in vitro transcription, followed by fragmentation according to the manufacturer's suggestion (GeneChip Expression Analysis Technical Manual rev5, Affymetrix

protocol.name: P-GSE51692-5
protocol.text: Ten microgram labeled samples were hybridized to the ATH1 Genome Array at 45℃ for 16.5 h. Washing and staining involved Fluidic Station-450 and the ATH1 Genome

protocol.name: P-GSE51692-6
protocol.text: Array was scanned with the Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner 7G
